0.0.2.name: wordpress/wp-bot-counter
0.0.2.description: Count how many times search engine crawls comes to your blog, and the last time it comes. Display in the admin menu. Now we support googlebot, baiduspider and msnbot, but you can add more by yourself in the admin menu.
